One Swipe, Instant Clarity – No More Streaks or Oil Film

Tired of glare and streaky windows? Oil film, grime, and water stains build up over time, distorting your vision and making driving dangerous—especially in rain or at night.

ClearVision™ works instantly. One simple swipe cuts through stubborn oil, repels water, and prevents fogging. No scrubbing. No streaks. Just crystal-clear visibility—so you can drive safely in any weather.

Not just for car windshields. This water-repellent works effectively on auto glass, windows, mirrors, and even shower doors, ensuring improved clarity across multiple surfaces.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

How long does the protection last?

The formula provides long-lasting protection, repelling water and preventing buildup for several weeks. Durability may vary depending on weather conditions and usage.

How do I apply it for the best results?

Using ClearVision is quick and easy – just follow these four steps:

  1. Wet Surface: Wet the surface with water to remove loose dirt.
    Keep it wet during cleaning.
  2. Activate Sponge: Shake well before use to generate foam.
    Open the cap and press the center of the sponge repeatedly until foam comes out.
    On first use, press firmly in the center once to break the inner seal.
  3. Clean Surface: Use the sponge to clean the surface evenly using consistent pressure.
  4. Rinse Immediately: Rinse the surface immediately and thoroughly with clean water after cleaning.
    Do not let any residue dry on the surface.

Can it be used on surfaces other than windshields?

Yes! It works on all glass surfaces, including car windows, mirrors, shower doors, and household glass.

How do I use it on interior surfaces?

How to Use Your ClearVision Cleaner – Interior Glass

  1. Wet Surface: Lightly dampen the glass with clean water to remove loose dust or dirt.
    Keep the surface slightly wet during cleaning.
  2. Activate Sponge: Shake well before use to generate foam.
    Open the cap and press the center of the sponge repeatedly until foam comes out.
    On first use, press firmly in the center once to break the inner seal.
  3. Clean Surface: Use the sponge to clean the surface evenly using consistent pressure.
  4. Wipe Off: Wipe the surface with a clean, dry microfiber cloth until fully clear.
    ⚠️ Do not let any residue dry on the glass.

Will it leave streaks or residue?

No, the advanced formula ensures a streak-free finish, providing crystal-clear visibility without smudges or haze.

Is it safe for all types of windshields?

Absolutely! It’s specially designed for all automotive glass, including tinted and treated windshields.

Does it also prevent fogging?

Yes! The formula not only repels water and removes oil film but also helps prevent fog buildup, ensuring clear visibility in all weather conditions.
